Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
+150% to all resistances/ Allocates Ash, Frost and Storm/ Adds 1 to 5 fire damage
--- Ghost of the Deep --- You are Touched by a Tormented Illegal Fisherman granting: 20% increased Damage 30% increased Attack Speed 30% increased Cast Speed 30% increased Movement Speed --- Stormy Seas --- 100% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage Your Cold Damage can Shock --- Brine Bound --- 50% chance to Freeze Enemies for 1 second when they Hit you Enemies you Freeze remain Frozen for at least 1 second

Input.name: customMods
Input.string: +150% to all resistances Adds 50 to 500 lightning damage to spells/
